website_summaries.verdict: This bath spout cover has a large hole to help parents reach the shower diverter.
pros: Can also act as a faucet extender for kids at the sink
Comes in a sea lion or an elephant design
Works better on narrower faucets than many other bath spouts
cons: The interior of this model has a grid pattern, which could trap water and not dry properly

customer_reviews.title: Choking hazard in small toys squeaker.
customer_reviews.text: The actual faucet cover is fine. But th toys that come with it are a huge chocking hazard. Not the toys themselves but the noise maker on the bottom is easily dislodged and the perfect size for chocking. Our daughter puts everything in her mouth. Being 10 months old this is normal. She was chewing on this toy and then started coughing. Thankfully I was right next to her and finger swept it out of her mouth but this was very scary. This is a huge problem.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Comparison vs. Skip Hop Moby
customer_reviews.text: Skip Hop's Moby was too big for my slim bath spout, so this one worked better. It's cut narrower-- so if bath spout is similar in size to a slimmer sink spout, it's worth a shot. BUT-- you cannot adjust it. Major design flaw. Moreover the interior has a grid pattern that is prone to mold if not cleaned regularly. TIP: after every bath, remove it from the spout to let dry fully. A pain, yes. But it's the only way to avoid the mold which is inevitable in nearly any tub cover. Is it a perfect fit? No, it still manages to slip off if disturbed. But it's OK enough for the job.
customer_reviews.author: nycgirl

customer_reviews.title: No more faucet ouchies for my kids!
customer_reviews.text: The last time my son hit his back on our faucet it was really bad. He had a gash and a huge bruise in his flank area, it healed but he has a scar from it. That's when i fibally decided we needed one of these. Well it's not really resembling an elephant head, but it definitely protects my kids from getting hurt on the faucet! Easy to put on, just slips on and stays put. Can access the shower function without removing it. For the price it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra few dollars and get something else!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awful. I would return it but have nothing else at the moment and must use it. I have ordered a different brand in the meantime. It's flimsy way of "attaching itself" to the faucet is laughable. Just slide it on.... for my 1 year old to just pull it right off. I guess you get what you pay for. I always try to save a buck or two... and here is the result. I spent the extra 3 dollars for something sturdier. And toddler resistant, at least!
customer_reviews.author: Lavnyia

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't have to be adorable to work
customer_reviews.text: It's not cute, or pretty, or even a good resemblance of an elephant. But the cute ones are ridiculously expensive, and this does the intended purpose. I don't want her to want to play with it, it needs to be this unattractive so the child has no interest in pulling it off the spigot. It's very cushy, easy to use, and I have no trouble getting to pull knob to activate the shower. I consider this a win, and a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Honest it covers our faucet and we have an older home so that's good but it slids down. Not sure if the water pressure moves it and it's secure but does slip on ocassion. The price is right and overall great. Grows mold so you need to scrub the inside from time to time .
customer_reviews.author: rosalynd lasalle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit snug on faucet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a faucet cover because my 10 month old is obsessed with the faucet and wants to touch it and put his mouth on it, so I had hoped this would fit snugly, but he is able to very easily pull it off and mess with the faucet anyways so, cover it no, I have to keep my hand on the faucet at all times. Also, the squeakers in the little toys pull out VERY easily and could definitively be a choking hazard. Threw those out night 1.
customer_reviews.author: Krysten Burton

customer_reviews.title: Danger!!
customer_reviews.text: Throw away the two tiny squeeky toys that come with this. It is a choking hazard!
customer_reviews.author: LJK

customer_reviews.title: I just threw it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this at all. The actual cover does not fit properly, no matter how you adjust the strap. It hangs low over the spout and directs the water towards the tub wall causing a lot of splashing out of the tub. The two included toys are nothing but a choking hazard. The first time my 20 month squeezed one of them the squeak mechanism popped out into the tub. Didn't even bother returning it. I just threw it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: jstice4ever

customer_reviews.title: Cute and effective!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our tub/shower combo as it has room for the shower switch that many similar products lack. The elephant is visually appealing, its not too obnoxious for our guest bathroom to where I feel like I need to remove it when company is around, and it isn't so distracting that my 16 month old fixates on it during his bath, so that's a relief. I removed it the other day after months of use, and there was barely and sludge/mildew built up. I'll admit I had been forgetting to check it, so I was worried about what I might find inside. Needless to say, I was pleasantly surprised at how clean it still was.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, soft, and safe!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is PERFECT for our son! After a really rough go of it where he hit his back on the tub spout really hard, I immediately went to Amazon and found this. He LOVES it and thinks it’s so cute, AND it keeps him safe! He loves how it looks like the water is coming out of the elephant’s trunk. He cautiously tested it out at first, quickly realized it took away the pain risk if he hit the spout, and we’ve had easy, painless baths ever since! :)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser521

customer_reviews.title: A must have when you have children
customer_reviews.text: My boys are 5 and 8. I just purchased this not long ago. I wish i would have gotten it a long long time ago. It would have spared their backs! This elephant is adorable. When a child hits the faucet the elephant truck tucks under and keeps them from getting scrapes. Its a simple elephant that easily goes over the faucet head and allows the shower to operated still.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Safely play near the faucet!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't need to stretch this for my faucet. It's a little loose, but it stays on well. My little one pulls at it, and it puts pressure on the seam, but it's been staying very sturdy, and I don't need to worry anymore when my little one bumps the faucet, which is the reason I got it to begin with! The little penguin and whale toys are okay. The white on the penguin scratches off, but they're extra and a cute addition, so don't let that deter your purchase. My little one still likes playing with them in the tub!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and keeps my baby from putting a gash in his head when he repeatedly insists on standing up by the faucet. I can’t use the toys because they had tiny sqeakers that fell out and are an obvious choking hazard for a 10 month old. But I didn’t buy the faucet cover because of the toys, so I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I Am

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put on. It slid on easily and fit snugly. My one year old loves to play with the water coming out of the spout and I would rarely let him for fear of him getting scratched up from it. I’ve been scarred from the spout a few times. I’m clumsy. This really put my fears to rest. He did play with it and take it off but I just put it back on and he left it. I wouldn’t leave him alone anyway. I used to have to put my hand on it or constantly hold him away from it. This was just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tffny Pldgr

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality, look and material
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing like the Skip Hop Moby (whale) faucet cover I was replacing because it got moldy over the years. This is two cut pieces of foam glued together, overlapped and with glue visible. Really sad looking thing. Worse, the shower switch knob gets stuck in the hole on top, because it's not large enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Makes bath time fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable faucet cover that makes bath time not only more fun for the little one but I like the fact that it is a somewhat soft rubber that adds safety so my guy cant hurt himself. An added bonus on this style is that you do not need to remove it to pull the shower lever up! Super easy to install too!
customer_reviews.author: KPITTTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: This is much nicer than the old one we had
customer_reviews.text: We had a similar item before, but this one is so much better quality. The older one was basically made of foam, and this one is a stronger more rubbery material. We won't use the toys in the tub because they are pretty cheaply made, but the price is still worth it just for the spout cover
customer_reviews.author: Bridget A. Longenecker

customer_reviews.title: Overall a really nice cover!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with this faucet cover. It doesn’t fit our tub spout quite right but is close enough to work. The hole for our shower knob isn’t back far enough but we can still easily move the knob up and down to work the shower. The material of the cover is a nice thick silicone and it extends down past the bottom of the spout so I don’t have to worry about my little one hitting his head.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: keeps the sharpest part of the faucet exposed
customer_reviews.text: we had different design faucet covers, this one is the worst so far. I understand the idea of leaving the top part open to be able to change to the shower function but this elephant leaves the pull up plug exposed and the point of this is to make the faucet softer in case a child slips or bends down, etc.
customer_reviews.author: ikko

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: I found it difficult put over the tub faucet. The sides of the cover were fused together and it didn’t seem like something I should rip apart. Once I squeezed it over the faucet it didn’t seem to sit right and when I turned the water on it did not extend the water out like I hoped. I didn’t think I had an odd shaped tub faucet but this cover definitely did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: CBT

customer_reviews.title: Actual product is great, add on toys are not.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am not giving this 5 stars is because the small squeak toys that come with this are a HUGE hazard for babies/toddlers. I let my son play with it and the next time I saw it the squeaker was half way out. I easily pulled it the rest of the way out and threw them both away. The spout cover fit perfectly on our faucet and our son loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Only came with only spoutcover, no extra toys. The whale is like a thick silicone material. Easily pliable if kids still want to access spout. Update: contacted customer service about issue, and they refunded me $2 for the missing toy
customer_reviews.author: Katie O

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The product was shipped promptly and arrived in a timely manner. Well made and high quality. Simple install just slipped on to the faucet and was easy to adjust. This product is thick enough to protect my little guys head from accidental bumps or possible cuts on the tub faucet and it's super cute! I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Texan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protection!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very old bathroom in which the bathtub faucet is quite unique. This elephant cover fits perfectly when the other covers I had bought fit too big. This one is perfect! My toddler can’t remove it to play with, which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: No return policy.
customer_reviews.text: Unusable for our bath faucet. Too large and the material was too thick to wedge in. The biggest bummer was that there was no return policy, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: L. Su

customer_reviews.title: Safe, strong, but hard to access shower lever
customer_reviews.text: I had the blue one previously. I like the looks of this one better, but it is more difficult to access the shower lever. I have to dig my fingers in and pry it out where with the blue one I could get to it a lot easier. Regardless it's the strong and longest lasting than others I've tried. But do wish the pink one was more like the blue one. It's definitely cuter!
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Partially broken at first, now unusable
customer_reviews.text: The glue holding the "ear" down is not strong enough. The "ear" was lifted half way off when we received it. After a few uses the rest of it came undone making it unable to stay together so it is unusable. I tried glueing it back with a strong adhesive but it did not work. Next I will try epoxy but it has now become a chore that sits around unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Goodmans

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Edit*** The sellers contacted me directly and offered to replace the product with a different version. As my daughter is in an extremely grabby phase, I declined the replacement, but I truly appreciated that they reached out to fix the situation. If you’re having any problems with their product, reach out to them and they will definitely help you out! The first day I got this, my daughter pulled it right off of the spout. The product was slowly sliding off of the spout as soon as I put it on. I guess I get what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Naz14

customer_reviews.title: Great product just be prepared to clean often
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and install , though it dies come off the spout too easily . Black mold firms quickly so I soak it in diluted bleach solution 1x a month to clean and ensure it’s healthy and safe for my babies
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Material not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product appears to be functional, but it is made out of foam material and not silicone. I also did not receive toys that were to be included. I'm mostly upset about not knowing what the material is. How do I know it is made from a safe synthetic? I find this very dishonest advertising and will not order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good price and sufficient
customer_reviews.text: Not the fanciest but it does what you need it to. Especially love the price. Cheapest faucet cover I could find and even though it took a little longer to ship I was happy I got a good deal and it works. Kids think it's cute.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mama
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on our faucet. My daughter loves taking baths but it made me nervous when she would sit up/ stand up near the faucet. I would have to put my hand there whenever she is playing near it, so glad that we bought this. Now we don’t have to worry about her bumping her head/ soft spot on the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas & Thanh

customer_reviews.title: Cover is great but beware of toys
customer_reviews.text: Cover is great, not the prettiest but does the job. The small toys that come with it are a choking hazard! I read some other reviews saying the same thing so as soon as I got them I popped the squeaker out (so very easy). I'm glad I did because my 10mo would have easily had that squeaker out and in his mouth. 4 stars is due to the toys. Some may not notice how easily the squeaker comes out and their baby could get choked.
customer_reviews.author: KL Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: A few people gave this a bad review because mold grows on the inside. I found that spraying the inside with foaming bleach and letting it sit for a minute, then rinsed it with water and viola - no more mold. I didn’t need to scrub it. Also, since then, no mold has grown back! It’s been about two months. This product is great and my daughter loves it. And I love that it protects her little head.
customer_reviews.author: Honeybee

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend using the toys that come with it. The actual spout cover is okay, I know all faucets are different so it may not fit yours perfectly. It fits over my standard low end faucet but my toddler pulls if off very easily. It ends up just sitting in the tub as she likes to yank it off, look at is and then drop it. Which makes it not very effective for its intended use.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Good and Solid cover.  Fit my spout very well.  Good protection for the kid.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this blue elephant spout cover for my kids bathroom. Overall sturdy and good quality, no smells when I first opened it and nothing flaked off. The two included squeaky toys also made my dogs pretty happy! Overall I would recommend this product for anyone trying to make their bathrooms more child-friendly
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I don't totally get the value of this. Is it for looks? Does it serve a practical purpose? I got it for my sister as a baby shower gift and she seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Meadow

customer_reviews.title: simple and easy, but doesn't fit well
customer_reviews.text: unless you have a flow-control pull knob on the top of the faucet, this spout cover will slide down all the time - it's cheap and works, but I would recommend a cover that attaches better. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. My son had almost hit his head so many times on our faucet. I found this on Amazon after doing a little research and I love it. I have a wider faucet with the shower release on the bottom and it fits perfectly. The only challenge is keeping my son from grabbing it off!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: No more hed injuries
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves the bath. He also loves to disregard his own safety and is constantly spinning around and more than once has come within an inch of burying his little head into the bath faucet. So... foam sea lion, of course. He gets a giggle out of it and I get to not have a heart attack. Well, for now, anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Sellars

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for about a year, it is a GREAT product and I would recommend it to my close family and friends! Covers our bath spout and ensures babies/kids safety!
customer_reviews.author: Khrysteena

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Love this and it works just like the whale we used to have from another store. I did have to cut a little sliver in it to make it fit perfectly, but that’s just because our bathtub is old and outdated.
customer_reviews.author: Suzears

customer_reviews.title: Great for all children
customer_reviews.text: I have a one year old who LOVES tub time. He also LOVES to bend down to pick his tub toys up, which happens to always be under the faucet. He is always protected when he lifts his head up, because the soft material allows his head to be protected. I would recommend this for ALL parents. And will now be parts of baby shower & or birthday gifts for m6y fiends and family members. I have yet to clean it, hopefully its as easy as it was to get on my faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose, however- my two year old is able to loosen the strap and take it off himself. I don’t like the strap. I almost returned it based on that alone.
customer_reviews.author: jmnop

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Install was so easy. In fact my 3 yr old grandson helped put it on. It's way easy to clean, soak in bleach water and you're set. Comfortable on the skin and my grandchildren are now that much safer with this little extra protection. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nilrad

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durable
customer_reviews.text: We had a name brand foam cover shaped just like this but it never stayed on and was annoying for the adults showering and eventually got torn by a 1yo. This stays on great and protects my kids from bonks on the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Adds Some Fun and Safety to Bathtime
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. He's so fascinated by it, and loves to grab onto it and play with it. It also adds a little peace of mind for me while giving him a bath, as I recall all too well the pain of smashing my head into a bath spout as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: IMorrow

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and it actually stays on. I can also use the shower without having to take it off. The toys are junk though, but that’s not why I purchased it. Has saved some little heads from quite a few bonks.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a spout cover for our bath tub for when our toddler is taking a bath. A few times she has almost slammed her head on the spout, and that was enough for us to decide to invest in something. I was pleasantly surprised on how easy this product was to install! It literally looks seconds. I also like how easy it is to still access the shower diverter. Not to mention how cute it is!
customer_reviews.author: NikkiSue102181

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do. Not much more I can say about that. I could see some value lost if a child was trying to stand or support themselves with the faucet, I doubt that is going to protect much. If they are sitting in the tub just washing or playing, get head guard
customer_reviews.author: ryan p reeves

customer_reviews.title: A little thinner than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and does give some protection for children. This is not as thick as many other options so it may not be what some are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: CobraJ

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but..
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job good protects kids from injury but got mold growth underneath. take it off after every use. The mold is not getting cleaned away.
customer_reviews.author: Samrat Bagchi

customer_reviews.title: Easily pulled off
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter thought it was a bath toy so she would just pull it off. There is no way to secure it unless you wanted to do something tacky like zip tie it to your spout (which I would absolutely do but I don't think my wife would appreciate it). It now lives in the same bag as her other bath toys and has not been used for it's intended purpose
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with our large bathtub spout. My toddler loves the elephant shape and the cute little toys that came with it! I did actually pull the squeaker out of the penguin though because it was so loud that it would drive my dog crazy every time my toddler played with it haha.
customer_reviews.author: Annie L.

customer_reviews.title: Love our elephant spout
customer_reviews.text: Wish I saw this kind of spout years ago. I got one from the store and it ruined our bath tub spout. This one fits, stays on and you can use the shower through the spout if you need to which is a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Arizona25

customer_reviews.title: Elephant Spout cover
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute. The material is soft to touch but strong to stay together. The color is a nice shade of blue. It is easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: MS48

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, perfect for us.
customer_reviews.text: We've tried faucet covers for the tub before and way always disappointed. But I can't say that this time. We love this product. Made of a rubbery silicone. It was easy to install just slipped right on. I'd definitely recommend buying one if you have small humans who are wild in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very cute and works for what I wanted it for. So when my toddler hits her head on the spout, that covers it and dosnt hurt
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Mold magnet
customer_reviews.text: Its get molds from the bath water quickly. It extremely hard to clean because it has like a bunch of little squares in the inner part. I tried with a small tooth brush. It comes off easily if the baby pulls on it. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this!!! Extremely easy to install. Protected my kids from accidentally hitting the faucet. Only down side. It was a little hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love the faucet cover
customer_reviews.text: Love the faucet cover! Super easy to use. The toys that cam with it are a nice bonus but I noticed the squeaky part came out easy and would be a chocking hazard for my LO. I took them out and threw them away. Toy is still usable, just doesn't squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Pink Elephant bath spout cover
customer_reviews.text: The bath spout cover is working nicely to help protect any potential head/facial blows during slippery bath time for my grand. Item was a bit snug to get on. I feel better having it in place for added protection. As described, quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Bath spout works great, although it does easily slide off
customer_reviews.text: Bath spout works great, although it does easily slide off. The toys it comes with seems to be a hazard. The squeaky part of both toys are easily removed, and one fell out on its own when my daughter was chewing on the toy. So beware and remove ahead of time if your baby likes to chew on things!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Maddalena

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another one first, but it didn't have the opening to pull up knob to turn on our shower, this one does!! So easy to put on and doesn't have to be removed to use the shower. Stays in place to keep my baby safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ronalyn Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely worked for me. I have no issues with the item. Definitely easy to install and easy to use. However, since i haven't cleaned it, can't technically rate that part of the feature.
customer_reviews.author: jengee2

customer_reviews.title: Falls off!
customer_reviews.text: It is cute and my boys love it! However, the entire reason why I purchased it is so it would cover my tub faucet. It falls off easily and doeant stay on well.
customer_reviews.author: Andriy Zyablov

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good. My son doesn't bonk his head on the hard faucet anymore which is great! Slides down everyone and then but nothing major.
customer_reviews.author: Keiran& Emerald Craig

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pull off
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but not a good option for curious babies. My little guy pulls it off easily several times during his bath. It becomes a struggle between the two of us... him pulling it off and me trying to stop him.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Fits all spouts, excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this spout cover, full disclosure , I bought one at Walmart for $20 and it did not fit my tub spout. When I ordered this my expectations weren't high bc if the price however I am unbelievably thrilled that it fits, it's secure , absolutely works perfect. The way they actually make this specific cover is smart bc it allows different spouts to be covered while still keeping your child safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Flexible for different size spouts!
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical bc it just 'sits' over tub spout. I put in on while my son was sleeping and he has not tried to take it off (and he is a VERY active 2 year old).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must for young children's bathtime
customer_reviews.text: This goes over the spigot in the tub so if toddler slips and falls they can't hurt their head on the spigot, Easy to use and does not interfere with water flow or temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Dari

customer_reviews.title: Rubber is very thick and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and the price was amazing. I used to have one you had to blow up, but tryin to find holes was difficult. This one is made great and definitely don’t need to find any more holes in it! Great with the kids and is amazing with not having to worry about them hitting there heads! Love, love, love this item! Wish I found it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: CHOKING HAZARD SQUEAK TOYS
customer_reviews.text: CHOCKING HAZARD! DONT LET YOUR KIDS PLAY WITH THE SQUEAK TOYS! The squeak toys have a removable squeak mechanism (for lack of a better word). It is a choking hazard and I'm very glad I inspected the toys before handing them over to my 8mo. Otherwise, very good quality and durable material. We like that the seal is adjustable, but it does occasionally slip off the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: cucumber

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I like how this spout cover just slips on and off without needing to adjust anything. Simpler than the whale version.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for bath time
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing to bits! I haven't had it for long but it's already prevent many head bonks on the faucet. Wish these were a thing when I was little. It's a nice sturdy bit of silicone, loved the little squeaky toys too
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Nugent

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, thick enough to protect my kids head, looks cool. My son loved two bonus rubber duckies. The only problem is, my kids won’t let it stay at the spout, they’re attracted to it and keep taking it off to play with it
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This spout cover works great in our tub. Easily installed. Not bulky. Able to use the shower without having to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and colorful!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so easy to install. You just slip it onto the faucet. Sturdy and looks like it will last a long time. I really like the bright pink color. I have some peace now that I have it on the faucet
customer_reviews.author: Leonila Olivares Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Great product just watch out for the little toys it comes with
customer_reviews.text: Love the actual product. It is WAY better than the foam types you can buy. My reason for giving it a 4 star is because of the little fish and penguin it comes with. They have a very small squeaker that came out after about 2min of squeaking and are a major CHOKING hazard. If you are like me and give the kid toys while you fill up the bathtub... you may stroke out when you realize the squeaker fell out and can't find it! Otherwise the spout cover is great.
customer_reviews.author: Unidentified

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for bathtub
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for covering the bath water spigot & you can still pull up the shower nob
customer_reviews.author: Shari S

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I love this spout cover. It fits perfectly over our spout and I don't have to worry about my daughter hitting her head on the spout when she is taking a bath. She enjoys playing with the little squeaky toys that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: A.Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Thinner but works well
customer_reviews.text: Fit over our spout well. Easy to pull the shower knob with this one. Not as thick as others, but it is flexible and can fit various spouts.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit to protect the little one, and still lets you use the shower unlike some other designs.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Super cute squeaky toys...
customer_reviews.text: Product is as discribed. Easy packaging to open. Easy to product to install. Two squeaky toys that come with this item are super cute. My little one loves the sound they make. Will recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: crayonblue

customer_reviews.title: Works well and fit a slightly larger than average faucet
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about getting this on our faucet because it seems like our faucet is a little bigger than average. But I was able to put it on without any issues of ripping or tearing to the product!
customer_reviews.author: Emy Max

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly over my faucet. Easy to access shower pull/nob thing on faucet. Heavy duty material to protect my little guys head from accidental bumps.
customer_reviews.author: April I.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job of keeping my baby from injury
customer_reviews.text: This product was good its just that I had to drill a hole so my I can turn on my shower head without having to having to always take it off and on.
customer_reviews.author: yoshi128

customer_reviews.title: Safe, easy, and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! My 1 year old daughter thinks it is hysterical. It has already saved us a few times from bumps and bruises when she tries to run around in the tub!
customer_reviews.author: Casslaine Beernink

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a good product. Mine slips off from the Fossett but my son loves it either way
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Fits the spout fine. Came when expected
customer_reviews.text: Fits the spout fine. Came when expected. Doesn’t come with any directions however but pretty easy to navigate. Not as thick as I’d hope it to be but it could be enough protection, hopefully we don’t have any incidents to test it out.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great for added protection against injury
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for protecting our granddaughters head and mouth since she likes to drink the water from the faucet when taking a bath. Was worried it wouldn’t fit our custom faucet - but it did.
customer_reviews.author: Popo Rock

customer_reviews.title: Remove squeek part from toy before giving to baby.
customer_reviews.text: Cute spout cover. Baby cant pull off. The two squeeky toys that come along are cute but the squeek part is choking hazard! Had to remove both parts before introducing to baby. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect! It fits my tub faucet perfectly and prevents my child from hitting his head when he insists on standing up in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Brown

customer_reviews.title: A must for Bath Safety
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and install! Makes my husband and I comfortable with letting our daughter be in a tub.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin M.Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep baby safe
customer_reviews.text: My baby is super interested on the faucet and this great to keep her safe. Material is soft and water flows as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Bogcle

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrific. I use it when my grandson is visiting as he loves to move around in the tub and I am afraid he will hit his head on the spout. It works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Smerkers

customer_reviews.title: Throw the free gift out- dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Love the actual product, BUT Be careful of the “free gift” bath squeak toys, the plastic part that makes the actual squeak noise came out of the toys and could have easily choked my baby if she found it first
customer_reviews.author: Amber U.

customer_reviews.title: MOLD!
customer_reviews.text: The inside isn't smooth. It has these dumb little square cut outs that allow water to collect, which means mold. No idea why they wouldn't have just made it a smooth piece ...
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and texture. Baby is able to slide it off my tap just a little but it does not slide off easily. So I just push it back on. He likes to watch it. It actually deterred him from going too close and playing with the faucet when the water is falling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Tub Faucet Cover for Baby - Bathtub Spout Cover for Kids - Bath Faucet Extender for Babies - Child Bathroom Accessories Faucet Protector - Soft Silicone Spout Cover Pink Sea Lions
product_meta.description:
Size:Sea Lions| Color:PinkFITS MOST FAUCETS
Easy to adjust strap secures and tighten on most spout. The tail also works a hook, hanging around when bath time is done. BABY PROTECTION
Baby bath spout cover can protect kids and toddlers from bumps and bruises caused by the bath spout when taking a baby bath. A water facet cover made from chrome or other hard materials can hurt a child if he bumps his head on it. Not only can this be painful and traumatic for the child, but it can also reduce their enthusiasm toward bath time. To reduce this risk you just need to install a soft tub spout cover. FUN FOR KIDS
The charmingly simple design for The Bathtub Spout Cover, with soft and durable rubber, makes bath time enjoyable for babies. EASY SHOWER ACCESS
A hole on the top of babytub spout cover allows easy access to the shower diverter. PACKAGE
1 x Pink Sea Lions Spout Cover
feature_bullets: 【BABY PROTECTION】 The Bathtub Spout Cover is thick and soft, protecting children from bruising and bumping themselves on the spout when taking a bath
【FITS MOST FAUCETS】 Universal Tub Faucet Cover doesn’t only fit bath spouts, it also fits a variety of bathroom sinks, from leading brands such as Delta, Moen, Kohler, and Danze.
【DURABLE MATERIAL】 Bath Faucet Extender uses premium silicone which is non-toxic, and FDA-approved.
【EASY SHOWER ACCESS】 A small opening in the top of the Spout Guard allows easy access to shower diverter.
【 18 MONTH WARRANTY】 Unconditional 18-month warranty on the silicone spout cover
